title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for derivative

1 point is earned for answer

f   ′   (   x   ) = x   e   1 − x   (   − 1   ) +   e   1 − x   = (   1 − x   )   e   1 − x   MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5C54@

f increases on (−∞,1]
